scripts.install-all: concurrently "npm install --prefix common-components" "npm install --prefix mfe-service-a" "npm install --prefix shell" "npm install --prefix shell/src/shared-ui"
scripts.start-all: concurrently "npm run dev --prefix shell" "npm start --prefix common-components" "npm start --prefix mfe-service-a" "npm start --prefix shell/src/shared-ui"
